name: Ball Roll (AshNDS)
description:
Ball Roll is a 2D Platformer type game. Your objective is to land on grassy plaforms and try to avoid rocky platforms as much as you can, as on contact with a rocky platform your health will be decremented. But more importantly avoid getting out of screen as it will result in immediate gameover. There are few cool power ups to pick up too.

Use arrow keys to play and "Escape" key to pause the game.  

That's all. Your honest review will be a great blessing to me. Consider donating a buck if you feel to.
